title: Mobile App-Based Instructional Design Applying Cognitive Load Theory to Improve Medication Calculation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Mathematical Computation Skills and Understanding of Fundamental Medication Management Concepts
context.additional_context: Hybrid learning environment combining VR simulations and mobile apps, centered on medication calculation scenarios mimicking real clinical situations.

learning_goals: Learners can solve various types of medication calculation problems (IV infusion, oral dosage, etc.) with 85% or higher accuracy
Learners can achieve a self-efficacy score of 3.5 or higher on a 4-point scale when performing medication calculations
Learners can identify and propose correction measures for 80% or more medication calculation error cases that may occur in real clinical settings
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
